Lumin Moisturizing Balm

Brand: Lumin

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Meadowfoam Seed Oil, Apple Extract, Ginger Root Extract, shea butter, Green tea extract, Licorice Root Extract

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity; LOW: Cancer, Use Restrictions
